com.itko.lisa.remote.client

Class DiscoveryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itko.lisa.remote.client.AbstractClient
      • com.itko.lisa.remote.client.DiscoveryClient

  • public class DiscoveryClient
extends AbstractClient
    Client methods pertaining to discovery/knowledge of a given existing agent

               throws com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.JMSInvocationException

      • getStatistics

        public java.util.List<com.itko.lisa.remote.stats.StatsFrame> getStatistics(IAgentInfo info,
                                                                  java.util.Date from,
                                                                  java.util.Date to)
        Returns a list of StatsFrames recorded for the specified agent between the from and the to dates.
        Parameters:
        info - the agent for which to retrieve statistics
        from - how far back to filter
        to - how recently to filter
        Returns:
        the desired StatsFrames list ordered by decreasing time (starting at the to date)

      • getStatistics

        public java.util.List<com.itko.lisa.remote.stats.StatsFrame> getStatistics(IAgentInfo info,
                                                                  java.util.Date from,
                                                                  java.util.Date to,
                                                                  int interval,
                                                                  int limit)
        Returns a list of StatsFrames recorded for the specified agent between the from and the to dates.
        Parameters:
        info - the agent for which to retrieve statistics
        from - how far back to filter
        to - how recently to filter
        interval - how much to aggregate the results in seconds. 1 means no aggregation, 10 means average the results of every 10 secs, etc...
        limit - the maximum number of results
        Returns:
        the desired StatsFrames list ordered by decreasing time (starting at the to date)
